overview: Created for Walt Disney Presents television series then expanded by popular demand into a full feature, Flash, the Teenage Otter follows one of Disneyâ€™s most beloved animal stars as he strikes out from his home at a Wisconsin wildlife sanctuary to see the wider world with all of its wonders and perils.
tagline: For This Happy-Go-Lucky Clown...Everyday is Play Day!
title: Flash, The Teenage Otter
